abstract: Stocks rise sharply, as investors are in buying mood due to positive economic data and corporate deals.
lead_paragraph: Traders welcomed a government report showing strong economic data in February, while another report pointed to a healthy spring buying season.

headline.main: Buoyant Economic Reports Push the Market Up
headline.print_headline: Higher Income and Spending Data Spur Market Rally

snippet: Traders welcomed a government report showing strong economic data in February, while another report pointed to a healthy spring buying season.
